name: Perfect Ring - recommended brand new tick tock tapingo games
name_original: Perfect Ring - recommended brand new tick tock tapingo games
description:
Tap the screen when the ring overlaps. Train your reflex. Cool minimalist display with relaxing rhythm.

Download the game now and play whenever you got free time. play session is short, suitable to fill extra time in your busy life.

Low download size wont compromise your phone's storage.
